about.me: Z3LDA pool is a United States based pool that is owned and operated by a staking team with a deep experience of blockchain and staking
about.server: Cloud Based Solution. Relays: 2 x 2 CPU, 8 GB RAM, 40 Gb SSD. Relay 1: U.S. East Coast, Relay 2: Paris. Automatic failover. Block Producer: 1 x 2 CPU, 8 GB RAM, 40 Gb SSD. Servers have been hardened via point-to-point VPN connectivity, multi-layer firewalling, shared memory protection, use of fail2ban, use of 2FA for authentication. No cold keys are stored on the server and are instead held on an air-gapped secure machine.
